alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 8:00PM CST until February 02 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT....Snow and slippery travel expected during the Wednesday morning commute. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, possibly locally higher in far southern Lake County. * WHERE...Lake IL County. * WHEN...From 10 PM CST this evening until 3 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional, mainly light snow, may continue beyond the current end time of the Winter Weather Advisory into Wednesday Night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
